function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unobserved heterogeneity in modeling framework","Impact":"Misleading correlations and estimations","Mitigation":"Include methods to account for unobserved heterogeneity, such as fixed effects or random effects models","Technologies":"Statistical modeling techniques, such as fixed effects or random effects models","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Fixed β coefficient assumption","Impact":"Inaccurate estimations and predictions","Mitigation":"Use methods that allow for variable coefficients, such as random effects models or mixed-effects models","Technologies":"Statistical modeling techniques, such as random effects models or mixed-effects models","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"}]}
